content.arrabic: نَوَيْتُ صَوْمَ غَدٍ عَنْ أَدَاءِ سُنَّةِ شَعْبَانَ لِلهِ تَعَالَى
content.latin: Nawaitu shauma ghadin 'an adaa'i sunnati Sya'bana lillâhi ta‘âlâ.

translation.id: Aku berniat puasa sunnah Syaban esok hari karena Allah ta’âlâ.
translation.en: I intend to perform the sunnah fast of Sha'ban tomorrow for the sake of Allah Ta‘âlâ.
